Rapid7 AWS Cloud Risk Assessment

Quickly assess your AWS cloud security posture with Rapid7

Organizations continue to migrate to the cloud at a rapid pace to meet business demands and stay competitive, increasing the complexity of their IT environments. As hybrid environments expand, maintaining risk and compliance becomes harder and harder.

Get cloud confidence and learn how to keep pace with cloud complexity as your business expands.

7 Questions to Determine Cloud Security Maturity


Before your company needs to spin up a new workload or migrate to a new environment, take a moment to assess your cloud security. Get insights into your cloud security after these 7 rapid-fire questions.

Business at the Speed of the Cloud


As the pace of business moves faster, companies need to be able to increase agility and flexibility. Whether you are focused on building a sophisticated new product or restructuring operations, the cloud is a way to move quickly and reliably.

AWS provides powerful resources that help companies innovate with increased flexibility, scalability, and reliability. But a cloud strategy cannot end there. Complex cloud environments need advanced security.

Risks of Cloud Migration and Misconfiguration

While cloud migration is essential for modern business, the journey is filled with risks. Complex cloud environments can make it difficult to detect and stop incoming threats.


  • 9 out of 10

    organizations are vulnerable to security incidents due to cloud misconfigurations 1

  • 45%

    of data breaches are cloud-based 2

  • +$284,292

    increase in data breach cost when cloud migrations are involved 3


Innovation in the cloud requires advanced tools to ensure visibility and compliance in every corner of your infrastructure. A patchwork of tools and an endless stream of alerts are not helping. To fully improve your security posture, embrace a unified platform that assesses risk in real time and helps you prioritize remediation.
